Title: General Ludd (No. 109)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Amanda Kate Shuman, Jason George (executive story editor), Amanda Kate Shuman (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red (James Spader) demands a deal from Cooper (Harry Lennix) before he'll agree to stop an anti-capitalist terrorist network's next deadly attack, while her dad's failing health reveals secrets in Liz's (Megan Boone) past.
